Articles.Content:
Hi, I was told I could get a C7 flight pack mod here. With bigger winglets and so on. But I have searched for one hour now here at the forum and cant seem to find it.

Anyone got a download link?

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/1004-C7-Aerospace-Division-Part-3-%28Experimental-Gear-plugin-in-first-post%29

This thread could probably be moved/locked, right?

I think you are right dishycourier

Thread closed.
